name: Tumblr + Missing E: Widescreen Notes
description: Missing E provides a widescreen dashboard style. However, I was dissatisfied with how the notes don't stretch all the way across the page.
additional_info:
Note: For best display, turn on "widescreen dashboard" in Missing E's settings.

v3 (2013/08/23): Updated to work with the new "popover notes".
v2: Tumblr made some site changes that broke the style.
v1: Initial release
